tweets.text: @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids So a spot check finds 6 loads when they make the effort that 42 a week. So 2184 a year and you wonder why we suffer.
I hope @AaronBell4NUL really goes for it on Wednesday in the @HouseofCommons. People are suffering because of @RedIndustries2 failures and @EnvAgency's failures. https://t.co/9rTGyVYfJj

@retrocolour85g1 @EnvAgencyMids @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL Gaslit in more ways than one now, aided & abetted by an embellished story by @Sotlive , claiming threatening behaviour. The victims (us) are being made to feel like the perpetrators. Well done @Sotlive for making 1 paragraph by @EnvAgencyMids into a work of fiction
@StinkStopthe

It‚Äôs time for a public apology from @EnvAgencyMids surely @SimonTagg and @AaronBell4NUL . I won‚Äôt hold my breath but this is what residents have been saying for months, years and have been completely gaslit! https://t.co/GmUd1ugEvB

For all these reasons and more, I am very grateful to Mr Speaker for granting me a 30 minute Adjournment Debate in the @HouseofCommons next Wednesday on the subject of:

‚ÄòOdorous emissions from Walley‚Äôs Quarry and the response of the Environment Agency'

Enough is enough.

This is something else taken from YOUR website @EnvAgencyMids , have they complied with this ? in particular on the weekend of March 7th & 8th when it was well over 100ppm . @StinkStopthe https://t.co/UhIIyhxQlD

@EnvAgencyMids @SOPH_C_ @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @ClareDinnisEA the people deserve to see proof of this apparent diligence that Red have been showing. How many other loads have been turned away then pre monitoring? #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/Q5uKtOp8Ty
@StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA Omg what a badly managed sh*t hole. Way too much plastic being buried too.
@richbeanjohnson @StinkStopthe @HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency Sorry you got it, we had rare night off, it's a dream to have every night off being poisoned for us all #stopthestink
@HelenVi00175623 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @Cap_it_off Stinks every time we drive past
@acj106 @YorkCycle @CityofYork @EnvAgency @sustrans Was this a planning condition @EnvAgencyYNE @CityofYork ? If so, let's hope it's done before Terry Avenue is closed. @YorkCycle
Is that Walleys Quarry I can smell in Sneyd Green today? Or is it @RedIndustries2 or Browns waste on Sneyd Hill Industrial Estate? #StopTheStink #walleysquarry @AbiBrown1 #moorcroft @EnvAgency

@timthefruit @MerryAlbright @EnvAgency Rendered ineffective from years of cuts. Not enough boots on the ground to make it worthwhile - seems even if you bulldoze a mile of SSSI there isn‚Äôt the power to do anything.
@MerryAlbright @EnvAgency Yes of course usually it is. But, whilst there are no effective penalties it's not going to stop.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly?

https://t.co/neO7mzoVRf

More agricultural muck stored against the rules, literally on top of a watercourse this time. Directly under the muck pile runs a drainage ditch that runs straight into the River Frome, which runs straight into the Lugg, which exceeds phosphate limits. @EnvAgency /1 https://t.co/IhAXZqe2gs

Today hundreds of children are breathing in toxic air in Silverdale due to toxic landfill fumes, the environmental agency @EnvAgencyNW is not working quick enough, this is an emergency. Please share and if you can donate https://t.co/kDuVm2eZef
https://t.co/aIHidTSozg

urls.description: The EA have failed us. Time for a backup plan‚Ä¶ The Landfill Stinks Cap It Off needs your support for Legal fund to Stop The Stink

tweets.text: @sunneofyork @timthefruit @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK True - farms already own & control the biggest potential ‚Äògains‚Äô when it comes to pollution but also own & control other solutions which require land/management change. But we can‚Äôt incentivise change by making the bad stuff profitable. Regs & laws should be complied with first.

@timthefruit @MerryAlbright @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK Yep, I‚Äôm not optimistic. Frustrating because it‚Äôs the perfect opportunity to change the nature of subsidies, and farmers have a lot to offer if properly incentivised.

@MarkGSuDS @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK 25 year plan - 75% of rivers to be close to a "Natural state" as soon as practicable.

Whatever "natural state" means? The whole statement is total nonsense.

Now, I would have to think about that ! @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids #Walleysquarreylandfill #Stopthestink #StopPlasticPollution 
Please tell us @EnvAgency when you have worked it out. https://t.co/Tcb9xmnXp0 https://t.co/2jCf5B9pv1

@malam_steven @StinkStopthe @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice @BorisJohnson @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA 1/2 The rooms or chambers of the lady who wrote this (excerpt from FB page) are full of hydrogen sulphide gas that she hasn‚Äôt consented to invading her home so theirs your answer. Chambers or rooms full of gas.

tweets.text: @sunneofyork @MerryAlbright @EnvAgency It's all change on the "subsidy" front but no clarity yet from @DefraGovUK as to who will get paid what for what. Devil will be in the detail and we ain't seen it yet. Danger is that it will be same old, same old. But current regulations are just not being enforced by @EnvAgency

@MerryAlbright @timthefruit @EnvAgency Britain and the EU gave billions to landowners to ‚Äòset-aside‚Äô land. We should change the nature of these subsidies and encourage farmers to manage land in an eco-friendly manner.

This is the River Arrow today. It runs to theLugg then the Wye. Lugg is an SSSI & Wye a SAC. Failing their phosphate targets for over a decade. 2 year moratorium stopping all new homes, schools, medical facilities, tourism accommodation even though EA say pollution is 65% Agri. https://t.co/0RGQFGIcvb

@malam_steven @StinkStopthe @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice @BorisJohnson @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA 2/2 the lady has two children with chronic health conditions who are subject to hydrogen sulphide gas in their homes every say.
